column1: Kata Robata////I'm a little disappointed with the presentation. Decor is simple
column2: waiters are trained to describe it as "family style dining" which is far from the truth given its location and setting. Look around
column3: are there any kids inside? Why would they market it as family style dishes? Their uni and chopped scallops are served in a cheap Asian soup spoon. If I'm paying $6 per bite of sashimi
column4: can't you present it any other way?
